trans-unit.source: A factory class for creating <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> objects from Windows NT aliases, email addresses, and security identifiers (SIDs).
trans-unit.target: Classe factory per la creazione di oggetti <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> da alias Windows NT, indirizzi di posta elettronica e ID di sicurezza (SID).

trans-unit.source: All methods in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> are static and no instance needs to be created.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i metodi in <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory> sono statici e non è necessario creare alcuna istanza.

trans-unit.source: The constructor is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Il costruttore è nascosto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> object associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration" /> associato a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactory" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> object is used for changing the standard Active Directory schema properties that the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> class uses.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Configuration.ActiveDirectoryRoleFactoryConfiguration> viene utilizzato per modificare le proprietà dello schema Active Directory standard utilizzato dalla classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole>.

trans-unit.source: The alias string to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: La stringa dell'alias per creare <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> utilizzando l'alias Windows NT specificato.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified Windows NT alias.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> che descrive l'alias Windows NT specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> è un'implementazione concreta della classe astratta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> utilizzata per accedere alla funzionalità Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory è utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> serve principalmente per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.

trans-unit.source: The email address string from which to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Stringa dell'indirizzo di posta elettronica dalla quale creare <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using an email address.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> usando un indirizzo di posta elettronica.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified email address.
trans-unit.target: Istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> che descrive l'indirizzo di posta elettronica specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> è un'implementazione concreta della classe astratta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> utilizzata per accedere alla funzionalità Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory è utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> serve principalmente per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> to use to create the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.
trans-unit.target: Il <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> da utilizzare per la creazione di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> using a Windows NT <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: Crea un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> utilizzando un <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> di Windows NT.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> that describes the specified <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" />.
trans-unit.target: Un'istanza di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole" /> che descrive il <see cref="T:System.Security.Principal.SecurityIdentifier" /> specificato.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is a concrete implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> abstract class that is used to access Active Directory functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> è un'implementazione concreta della classe astratta <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.WorkflowRole> utilizzata per accedere alla funzionalità Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the Active Directory store is used for storing organizational information for personnel.
trans-unit.target: In genere, l'archivio di Active Directory è utilizzato per archiviare informazioni organizzative sul personale.

trans-unit.source: The main purpose for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> is for making queries against such organizational information for business reasons.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.ActiveDirectoryRole> serve principalmente per eseguire query su informazioni organizzative per ragioni aziendali.
